bug.short_desc: Seafile Client does not support Shibboleth SSO
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Linux build of seafile-client does not support Shibboleth single sign-on
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
Version : 5.1.1 Release : 3.fc24
How reproducible: 100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1.dnf install seafile seafile-client. 2.Open seafile-applet 3.Notice that there is no Shibboleth sign on
Actual results: Missing Shibboleth sign on
Expected results: See this screenshot: https://forum.seafile.com/uploads/default/original/1X/4f4448f9970f9a04ea9d0ab1c4c03cf3cc7a0dc1.png
Additional info: Needs to be fixed upstream
seafile-client-6.0.0-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-5f73f9d65f

Information on how to enable can be found here: https://github.com/haiwen/seafile-client/issues/845
Just tested on fedora 25, it works correctly with standard server.
Thanks! Would you mind building it for fc24 as well?
seafile-client-5.1.1-4.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-2965c6aa75

> Would you mind building it for fc24 as well?
Done. It should land in testing soon.

seafile-client-6.0.0-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-5f73f9d65f

seafile-client-5.1.1-4.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-2965c6aa75

(In reply to Julien Enselme from comment #6) > > Would you mind building it for fc24 as well? > > Done. It should land in testing soon.
Thanks! I assume we can close this bug as SOLVED
seafile-client-6.0.0-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
seafile-client-5.1.1-4.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
